Truth or Drink.description: Choose someone to ask a question from the list below. If you dont answer, you must drink

Dares.description: Pick a dare from this list of 3

Zip Zap Zop.description: Point to the right for zip, point to the left for zap, point across for zop

Never have I ever.description: 5 fingers up, first one to lose has to drink

Medusa.description: Everyone looks down and looks up at the same time. Anyone looking at each other must drink

Hot seat.description: You must answer all the questions in the next 45 seconds
